name: Emergency Shelter: Nuclear Attack
description:
You were woken up in the night by your phone alerting you of the current situation : A nuclear attack is ongoing on your country's territory !

Hopefully, your house have this good old shelter that will save everything... Better reinforce it before it's too late !

Emergency Shelter: Nuclear Attack, or in short, Shelter, is a narrative survival game where you will need to survive and reinforce your shelter before the disaster returns. Wander around the city of Thunderstorm to encounter people that you will help you (or not), and to find the resources to survive and reinforce this shelter for good.

Controls

Movements : WASD or ZQSD

Interact : Enter key / Space key / Left click

Right click on items in the inventory to bring the use/equip/drop menu

Note: The game can be played with a controller but the keyboard and mouse are strongly recommended.
